mapper.select: SELECT i.market_id, i.tenant_id, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AS report_time, ( CASE WHEN i.price < 50000 THEN '0' WHEN 49999 < i.price AND i.price < 100000 THEN '1' WHEN 99999 < i.price AND i.price < 150000 THEN '2' WHEN 149999 < i.price AND i.price < 200000 THEN '3' WHEN 199999 < i.price AND i.price < 250000 THEN '4' WHEN 249999 < i.price AND i.price < 300000 THEN '5' WHEN 299999 < i.price AND i.price < 350000 THEN '6' WHEN 349999 < i.price AND i.price < 400000 THEN '7' WHEN 399999 < i.price AND i.price < 450000 THEN '8' WHEN 449999 < i.price AND i.price < 500000 THEN '9' WHEN 499999 < i.price THEN '10' END ) AS invoice_price_id, ( CASE WHEN i.price < 50000 THEN '5万以下' WHEN 49999 < i.price AND i.price < 100000 THEN '5-10万' WHEN 99999 < i.price AND i.price < 150000 THEN '10-15万' WHEN 149999 < i.price AND i.price < 200000 THEN '15-20万' WHEN 199999 < i.price AND i.price < 250000 THEN '20-25万' WHEN 249999 < i.price AND i.price < 300000 THEN '25-30万' WHEN 299999 < i.price AND i.price < 350000 THEN '30-35万' WHEN 349999 < i.price AND i.price < 400000 THEN '35-40万' WHEN 399999 < i.price AND i.price < 450000 THEN '40-45万' WHEN 449999 < i.price AND i.price < 500000 THEN '45-50万' WHEN 499999 < i.price THEN '50万以上' END ) AS invoice_price_name, COUNT(i.price) AS sales_count, AVG( IFNULL( DATEDIFF(i.bill_time, c.register_time), 0 ) ) AS stock_avg_stocktime FROM maxcar_market_l.`invoice` i LEFT JOIN maxcar_stock_l.`car` c ON i.car_id = c.id WHERE i.invoice_status = 2 AND i.car_sources = 1 AND i.bill_time BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND DATE_ADD( DATE_ADD( STR_TO_DATE( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ), INTERVAL - 1 SECOND ) GROUP BY i.tenant_id,invoice_price_id
